testcase.classname: User creates account at Cleverbot and interacts with chatbot
testcase.name: User signs up, gets verified and chats with the bot
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to landing page........................................passed When A User clicks sign in link.............................................passed And A User enters valid sign up data........................................passed Then User sign up notification is displayed.................................passed When A User receives registration e-mail....................................passed And A User navigates e-mail verification link...............................passed Then E-mail verification is successful......................................passed When User signs in with valid email and password............................passed And Accepts policies........................................................passed And User sends "Please, work!" message to the bot...........................passed Then Bot replies............................................................passed
